General.Name: Fashion Bel Air S.A
General.Description: Fashion Bel Air S.A. provides fashion products for women in France. It offers blouses, shirts, tops, T-shirts, pulls, sweats, jumpsuits, skirts, trousers, jeans, jackets, and coats. The company provides its products online, as well as through boutiques. Belair-Paris.fr. Fashion Bel Air S.A. is headquartered in Paris, France.
